blogPost.title: What are the biggest obstacles you see when it comes to human resources post-pandemic? Answer by @Karalyg, Senior HR Law Analyst. https://t.co/hc90RCoBhj https://t.co/4K08OcBky7
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: パンデミック後の人的資源に関して、最大の障害は何でしょうか？Answer by @Karalyg, Senior HR Law Analyst. https://t.co/hc90RCoBhj https://t.co/4K08OcBky7
谈到大流行病后的人力资源，你认为最大的障碍是什么？回答者：@Karalyg，高级人力资源法律分析师。https://t.co/hc90RCoBhj https://t.co/4K08OcBky7
談到大流行病後的人力資源，你認爲最大的障礙是什麼？回答者：@Karalyg，高級人力資源法律分析師。https://t.co/hc90RCoBhj https://t.co/4K08OcBky7

我们如何才能消除教育中的偏见？回答者：@ScanlonPatricia, 创始人/CEO @soapboxlabs. https://t.co/fH14UbLfwV https://t.co/qH0EfkVu2t

next.title: What are your top 5 tips for founders/entrepreneurs? Answer by @KunalLunawat, GP & Co-founder at @AgyaVentures. https://t.co/YSGhApN4oJ https://t.co/4iImskoq3z
